name: @azure-tools/extension
description: Yarn-Based extension aquisition (for Azure Open Source Projects)

scripts.set-version: node -e "let pkg = require('./package.json'); require('child_process').exec('git rev-list --parents HEAD --count --full-history .', (o,stdout) => { const v = pkg.version.split('.'); v[v.length-1] = (parseInt(stdout.trim()) -1); const orig=JSON.stringify(pkg,null,2);  pkg.version = v.join('.'); const delta = JSON.stringify(pkg,null,2 ); if( orig !== delta) require('fs').writeFileSync('./package.json',delta)})"
scripts.reset-version: node -e "let pkg = require('./package.json'); const v = pkg.version.split('.'); v[v.length-1] = 0; const orig=JSON.stringify(pkg,null,2);  pkg.version = v.join('.'); const delta = JSON.stringify(pkg,null,2 ); if( orig !== delta) require('fs').writeFileSync('./package.json',delta)"
scripts.clean: ver > nul 2>&1 nul && npm run --silent clean-cmd || npm run --silent clean-bash
scripts.clean-cmd: if exist dist rmdir /s /q dist && exit 0 || exit 0
scripts.clean-bash: rm nul && rm -rf dist && exit 0 || exit 0
